name: Chemical Trouble
description: Chemical Trouble is a Shoot 'em Up style game that has enemies spawn in waves as you have to dodge and pick the proper color bullet to do more damage to enemies and bosses as the waves get higher. This game was worked on in a group of 3 by me and 2 colleagues for a Game Design class at LIU Post where we had to create, market, and sell a game by the end of the semester.
